string.text: Medicamentos contra la radiación

Las drogas de protección radiológica de Mexaminum son comunes en la Zona. Cuando se usa, este medicamento induce a la contracción de los vasos sanguíneos periféricos y la privación de oxígeno, que sirven para tratar y prevenir la exposición a la radiación. The drug does not have severe side effects, although isolated cases of mild nausea, dizziness, cramps and stomach pain have been reported.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] significant health reduction
Vendaje

Un vendaje elástico normal utilizado para detener el sangrado y prevenir la infección de heridas. Para sangrado regular, aplique cuidadosamente el vendaje a la herida. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] first-aid item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (adhesive plaster)
Vinca

Ukrainian Vikasolum - an artificial equivalent of vitamin K. The main purpose of this drug is to increase blood coagulation speed. In great demand among stalkers who want slow-healing wounds and lacerations inflicted by mutants to close up faster. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
Anabióticos

Un fármaco experimental desarrollado por el profesor Ozersky para los equipos de investigación científica que trabajan en la Zona. At its core, the drug contains tetrodotoxin, known colloquially as "zombie powder," which causes a complete shutdown of the body's central nervous system that may allow people to survive emissions outside cover. After six years worth of field tests, thoughtful stalkers know to keep a few on hand for unexpected blowouts.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes temporary blackout
Bloqueador psíquico

Un fármaco que bloquea los impulsos nerviosos similares a avalanchas. El consumo induce la pérdida a corto plazo de todas las emociones. Se usa exclusivamente en la Zona para contrarrestar los efectos de los campos psicológicos anómalos. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes extreme dizziness
Antídoto

La antitoxina IP2 es un fármaco complejo que comprende varios antídotos, que incluyen metoclopramidum, piridoxina, tiamina, riboxina y otros productos farmacéuticos. The drug is used to inject a range of antibiotics to neutralise natural poisons, together with synthetic poison absorbers, into the bloodstream. IP2 no es particularmente popular en la Zona ya que la mayoría de los stalkers confían en una máscara de gas y un traje protector. Sin embargo, todavía hay quienes tienen algunas unidades de este antídoto escondidas para situaciones de emergencia. The effects of the drug are long-lasting. Take one capsule at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes dizziness
Hércules

El componente principal de este producto es un andrógeno anabólico, un esteroide artificial, cuya composición química se parece a la testosterona. A menudo utilizado por stalkers durante redadas largas para reducir la fatiga muscular. Aumenta significativamente la capacidad de carga de peso. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] drink
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Radioprotector

Radioprotector Indraline B190, incluido en los botiquines distribuidos al personal de la planta de energía nuclear. Usado en la Zona en lugar del clorhidrato de cisteamina PC1 excesivamente tóxico, cuyo uso repetido a menudo causaba la muerte. Reduce los efectos de la radiación gamma en el tejido vivo. Se consume mejor antes de la exposición, ya que los efectos no son instantáneos, pero el medicamento dura mucho tiempo. Take one capsule at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
Akvatabs

Pequeña bolsa de plástico con pastillas destinadas a desinfectar el agua que contiene bacterias y virus dañinos. Use two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (dispersible tablets)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
Basic medical package

A medical package containing a variety of equipment for treatment of minor injuries.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage (4)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] improvised stimpack
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] metamizole ampoule
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sulfadimethoxine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] tourniquet
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] yadulin
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Army medical package

A military-grade medical package, containing a large amount of stimulating medical drugs.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] ampoule of morphine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] anti-radiaton preparation
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] aquatab tablets
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] bandage (4)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] caffeine tablets
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] harness (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] military stimulant
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sleeping pill (blister)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] tetanus vaccine
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Scientific medical package

A medical package, designed for use specifically in the Zone. It contains a large amount of drugs for the purposes of countering chemical, psy- and radioactive hazards.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]CONTENTS:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] anti-radiation drugs (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] antioxidant IP2
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] big glucose shot
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] cystamine (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] diclofenac sodium
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] epinephrine
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] harness
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] indralin-B190
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] mineral water
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] psi-block
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] scientific stimulant (2)
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[default] sulfadimethoxine
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] storage for medical equipment
Diclofenac sodium

Non-steroidal anti-inflammatory drug from the group of phenylacetic acid derivatives. The effect of the drug dulls the user's nervous activity. Because of the huge number of side effects, such as headache, dizziness, drowsiness, and in some cases memory disorders, disorientation, irritability, it is not used for medicinal purposes in most countries. However, in the Zone it has become popular due to a side effect expressed in violation of the sensitivity of the central nervous system, which allows it to withstand severe injuries, such as gunshot and shrapnel wounds.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] average damage resistance bonus
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] slight health restoration on usage
Tourniquet

A haemostatic rubber tourniquet, allowing the user to stop bleeding.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] first-aid item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (tourniquet)
Yadulin

A semi-drug based on morphine. It allows the user to quickly dull pain and increase production of adrenaline, aiding the user in withstanding even the most intense battles. It is popular among stalkers, often used as a recreative drug among criminal groups, and is allegedly being supplied to the Monolith.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] agonistic effect
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes a short-term clouding of consciousness
Botiquín de primeros auxilios

A general purpose medical kit. Handy for treating injuries, wounds, chemical and thermal burns and various types of poisoning.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Botiquín médico del ejército

A specialised medical kit for providing first aid to combat casualties. El kit incluye coagulantes sanguíneos basados en menadiona, analgésicos, antibióticos e inmunoestimulantes, así como un kit para eliminar las balas y los fragmentos del cuerpo. This medkit is issued primarily to army personnel such as Spetsnaz units venturing deep into the Zone and is popular among Duty forces.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Kit médico científico

A medical kit designed specifically for use in the Zone. The kit contains products for handling wounds, as well as preventing the development of radiation poisoning and reducing accumulated radiation in the body. Contains Vikasolum, Batilolum and Naphazoline, unlike other medkits.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] valuable
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (field kit)
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] prolonged body recovery time
Dosis de glucosa pequeña

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycaemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. La inducción instantánea de carbohidratos implica un aumento rápido de la energía, lo que permite al usuario realizar un mayor esfuerzo físico y soportar el estrés. Due to its convenient means of administration, they can be used in combat situations. This makes glucose shot a very good way to speed-up the healing process.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Dosis de glucosa grande

Glucose shots are used in cases of severe diabetic hypoglycaemia, but can also be employed as a stimulant. La inducción instantánea de carbohidratos implica un aumento rápido de la energía, lo que permite al usuario realizar un mayor esfuerzo físico y soportar el estrés. Due to its convenient means of administration, they can be used in combat situations. This makes glucose shot a very good way to speed-up the healing process.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Estimulador improvisado

Improvised stimpacks are popular among novice Zoners as they are easy to obtain and inexpensive. Producido en la Zona a partir de ingredientes comúnmente disponibles, sin el equipo y la purificación adecuados. This is the cause of many side effects which include headache, paraesthesia and considerable increase in nutrition demand. Injected in the thigh.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] moderate body recovery time
Paquete de estímuladores militares

Los estímuladores militares constituyen una parte del equipo de soldado estándar para las operaciones de campo en la Zona. Fácilmente disponible en el mercado, se pueden adquirir a un precio moderado. Popular entre stalkers experimentados. They are significantly more potent and faster working than their improvised counterparts, which makes them perfect for use in life-threatening situations. Produced from raw agents of high density which can take their toll on the body. Side effects include shock, extreme dizziness and increased hunger.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] military item
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast body recovery time
Estimulante científico

Created by the same defence research institute in Kiev which developed the well-known SEVA suit, this state-of-the-art solution constitutes the most potent health stabiliser available in the Zone. Best quality ingredients and perfected formula enable almost instant recuperation and ensure prompt radiation cleansing. Side effects are minimised. Extremely high cost practically limits the target group of the drug to most skilful and successful stalkers.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] rapid body recovery time
Sleeping pills

A package of small sleeping pills that will almost immediately induce sleepiness, which also helps reducing avalanche-like nerve impulses for a considerable period. Swallow some time before you want to rest and drink a few sips of water afterwards for maximum effect. Take two tablets at a time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] immediate sleepiness induction
Cocaína

Small aluminium case containing cocaine and the tools facilitating use. La cocaína es un poderoso estimulante del sistema nervioso. Sus efectos pueden durar de 15-30 minutos a una hora, dependiendo de la forma de administración. La cocaína aumenta el estado de alerta, induce sentimientos de bienestar, competencia y sexualidad. Ansiedad, paranoia e inquietud son efectos secundarios comunes. Con una dosis excesiva, se observan temblores, convulsiones y aumento de la temperatura corporal. Bandits are known for sniffing this drug right before launching an assault or ambush.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] very potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] slight health restoration on use
Epinephrine shot

La epinefrina (también conocida como adrenalina) es una hormona y un neurotransmisor. La epinefrina tiene muchas funciones en el cuerpo, regulando instantáneamente la frecuencia cardíaca, los diámetros de los vasos sanguíneos y del paso del aire, y los cambios metabólicos. La liberación de epinefrina es un componente crucial de la respuesta de lucha o huida del sistema nervioso simpático. The effects lead to increased blood glucose and fatty acids, providing substrates for instant energy production within cells throughout the body.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] very potent alcohol sobering effect
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] slight health restoration on usage
Morphine ampoule

Una ampolla de hierro diseñada como equipo de campo para personal militar para la reducción inmediata del dolor. Esta ampolla contiene una poderosa dosis de morfina. En la medicina clínica, la morfina es considerada como el estándar de oro de los analgésicos opioides utilizados para aliviar el dolor y el sufrimiento severo o agonizante. Al igual que otros opiáceos, como la oxicodona, la hidromorfona y la diacetilmorfina (heroína), la morfina actúa directamente sobre el sistema nervioso central (SNC) para aliviar el dolor. Injected into an arm or a thigh.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] high quality
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] large damage resistance bonus
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] moderate health restoration on usage
Metamizole ampoule

Una ampolla de hierro diseñada como equipo de campo para personal militar para la reducción inmediata del dolor. Contiene una poderosa dosis de metamizol mezclado con un medicamento antihemorrágico. Metamizole es uno de los medicamentos antiinflamatorios no esteroideos más fuertes (AINE), especialmente eficaz para aliviar los dolores y dolores además de reducir la fiebre. También es útil como medicamento antiinflamatorio cuando se usa en dosis más altas. Puede causar algunos efectos secundarios tardíos, como leucopenia o agranulocitosis, por lo que debe usarse con moderación. Inyectado en un brazo o un muslo. Its availability in the Zone is limited due to the difficulty of smuggling the medicine across military cordons.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] moderate damage resistance bonus
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] small health restoration on usage
Caffeine tablets

Cafeína y benzoato de sodio que hacen que el sistema nervioso central funcione con la mayor efectividad posible en un momento dado. Reduce la somnolencia en gran medida. Take two tablets at one time.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
Cystamine

A substance functioning as a radioprotector, used to weaken the effects of radiation on the body. The radioprotective effect of cystamine is based on the ability to bind free radicals - ionised and excited molecules formed in tissues upon irradiation - as well as the ability of the drug to interact with certain enzymes and impart resistance to ionising radiation. The effects of cystamine do not counteract already accumulated radiation.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] significant health reduction
Sulfadimethoxine

Sulfanilamide medication, effective against gram-positive and gram-negative bacteria. It acts on pneumococci, streptococci, staphylococcus, E. coli, Klebsiella stick (Friedlander's stick), causative agents of dysentery; is less active with respect to the protein; is active against the trachoma virus (an infectious eye disease that can lead to blindness); It does not act on strains of bacteria resistant to other sulfanilamide preparations. Adverse effects include headaches, digestive disorders, skin rashes, fevers and leukopenia. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] significant health reduction
Chlortetracycline

An antibiotic. Crystalline powder of golden yellow colour, bitter taste, soluble in water. This is one of the first open antibiotics (after penicillin).
 Chlorotetracycline hydrochloride has a bacteriostatic effect on gram-positive and gram-negative microbes, rickettsia and some large viruses.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] average increase in drowsiness
Etperazine

Tablets coated with a shell, containing 4.6 and 10 mg of perphenazine. The drug is a neuroleptic - an antipsychotic agent that provides antiallergic, sedative, miorelaxing, antiemetic, weak anticholinergic, hypotensive and hypothermic actions. The efficacy of Etperazine is due to the blockade of D2 receptors in the mesocortical and mesolimbic systems. Rarely used in the Zone.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] anti-inflammatory
Porro de cannabis

Known for their relaxing effects, joints are used by stalkers recreationally, especially those who frequent the Barrier or the Red Forest beyond it. Induces a soothing effect if combined with alcohol. Increases hunger.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] zone-produced
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild alcohol sobering effect
Axyltallisal "The Rebirth"

Warning! Do not use in combination with any other drug as this may prove lethal. This powerful mixture contained in a small syringe will make you lose consciousness. But when you wake up (if you wake up), you will feel reborn. Inject the syringe into your thigh when sitting down.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] clean nutrition source
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] causes temporary blackout
Tetanus vaccine

Tetanus vaccine is composed of inactivated tetanus toxin and is used to prevent an individual from contracting tetanus. Tetanus, also known as lockjaw, is a disease caused by the bacteria Clostridium tetani which enter the body through open wounds and release a poison called tetanospasmin. Tetanus is a potentially deadly disease because the poison attacks the nervous system blocking nerve signals from the spinal cord to and from the muscles. Animals and mutants alike are prone to carry Clostridium tetani which can be transferred through bites. Injection of inactivated toxin enhances your immunological system and can lead to several positive side-effects. Moreover, this vaccine has been supplemented with several additional anti-toxins making it usable for purposes other than preventing contraction of tetanus.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] fast usage (syringe)
Potassium iodide

A pharmacological compound, used in the Zone as a cheap means of countering the effects of radiation on the body. Causes numerous side effects, notably gastrointestinal tract blistering, numbness to pain and dysfunction of the thyroid gland.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] medicine
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] imported
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] mild dizziness
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] significant health reduction
Marijuana

Self-grown cannabis. Smoking it is a popular pastime, especially among Freedomers who've served at the Barrier. Marijuana bags can be bought here and there in the Zone. Some believe that the drug helps retain a balance of the mind.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] stimulant
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] slow usage (prolonged inhalation)
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] potent alcohol sobering effect
